Rodney McMillian (amụrụ na 1969, na Columbia, South Carolina) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Los Angeles
McMillian bụ Prọfesọ nkè ihe osise na UCLA School of Arts and Architecture na Mahadum California, Los Angeles.
McMillian nwèrè BA na Foreign Affairs na Mahadum Virginia
Ọ gụrụ nka na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture, ma nweta nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na California Institute of the Arts na 2002.

AsE gosipụtara ọrụ McMillian na UCLA Hammer Museum na Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles, Studio Museum na Harlem New York, Herning Art Museum na Denmark, Royal Academy na London, Boston's Institute of Contemporary Arts na Whitney. Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta gụnyere Harald Falckenberg Collection na Saatchi Gallery. E gosipụtara ihe ngosi onwé ya nkè afọ 2012 Prospect Ave na Maccarone na New York ma gosipụta ihe ọkpụkpụ a chọtara, ntinye pụrụ iche, vidiyo, na ihe osise.
